title: INTERMEDIATE PACKED DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION
description:
The INTERMEDIATE PACKED DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION is the PRIMARY PACKED DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION in an INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING FOR CONFIGURATION.
In the application MDG one INTERMEDIATE PACKED DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION is defined within one PRODUCT CONFIGURATION. Therefore it has no ID an it is assigned to only one PRODUCT CONFIGURATION (1).

quantityIntermediatePackagingPerSecondar.title: quantityIntermediatePackagingPerSecondaryPackaging
quantityIntermediatePackagingPerSecondar.description: If applicable, the Quantity Intermediate Packaging per Secondary Packaging describes the number of INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING each containing a number of Primary Packed Drug Product.

quantityPrimaryPackedDrugProductPerInter.title: quantityPrimaryPackedDrugProductPerIntermediatePackaging
quantityPrimaryPackedDrugProductPerInter.description:
If applicable, the Quantity Primary Packed Drug Product per Intermediate Packaging describes the number of Primary Packed Drug Product (e.g. 5 blisters) in an INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING (e.g. 1 pouch).
In the MDG application the INTERMEDIATE PACKED DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION only quantifies one PRIMARY PACKED DRUG PRODUCT. Therefore, it is not possible to describe mixed intermediate Packaging to many Drug Products (e.g., mixed tray).

intermediatePackagingForConfigurationId.title: intermediatePackagingForConfiguration.packagingId
intermediatePackagingForConfigurationId.description: Unique identifier of the object INTERMEDIATE PACKAGING FOR CONFIGURATION.
